headline.main: FRANCE THREATENS TO DESTROY JIBUTI; Colonial Minister Declares on Return That Somaliland Will Leave Little for British

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 11 -- Returning from a round-trip air flight to French Somaliland, Vice Admiral Rene Platon, French Minister of Colonies, today declared to reporters at the air field here that In view of the British attitude the colony would hold out to the end.
abstract: Vice Adm R Platon says Jibuti port and rr will be destroyed if French Somaliland is forced to surrender

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
